body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Dealership Customer Service. My name is Philip Edwards. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is Deborah Adams.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Deborah. Can you please provide me with your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. It's five five five, two two three, three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. And may I have your email address as well, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect. Thank you, Deborah, for providing that information. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out, Deborah. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact us. Have a great day!
